A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The film challenges a lot of what people perceive Star Wars to be.  I enjoyed the film quite a bit\, but it definitely upends a lot of accepted ideas.  I can see a lot of fans being uncomfortable with these stories which in many ways they feel like they own.  The best part in my mind is that is untethers future movies from a lot of the mysteries that in some ways weigh the story down.\n\nI'm definitely interested to see if my perception of the film changes over time.
